section.11: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ubadah bin As-Samit said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) led us in one of the prayers in which the recitation is done out loud, and he said: 'None of you should recite when I recite out loud, apart from the Umm Al_quran (Al Fatihah)
